Comments
August 9, 2022
heyodern
There is a lot of utility in having force blast that is both free and direction-controlled. She can just yank a piece into a kill box for the rest of the team to use as a pinata. Add in perplex, a decent attack and the stealth/CR combo, and Storm can really be annoying to opponents.
